original_text: But if Christ is in you, although the body is dead because of sin, the Spirit is life because of righteousness.
korean_text: 또 그리스도께서 너희 안에 계시면 몸은 죄로 말미암아 죽은 것이나 영은 의로 말미암아 살아 있는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But if Christ is in you,
although the body is dead because of sin,
the Spirit is life because of righteousness.
